mapper.insert: insert into user(email, id, phone_num, name, password, sigungu_cd) values(#{email}, #{id}, #{phone_num}, #{name}, #{password}, #{sigungu_cd})
mapper.select: select email from user where email = #{email}

select A.*, count(F.follower_user_seq) as follower from (select U.user_seq, U.id, U.name, count(R.review_seq) as post_count, count(F.following_user_seq) as following from user U left join follower F ON U.user_seq = F.follower_user_seq left join review R ON U.user_seq = R.user_seq where U.id = "${id}" group by U.user_seq) A left join follower F ON A.user_seq = F.following_user_seq group by A.user_seq
